Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
Frame This module is here to manage the frames and the panels
MySQLConnector The goal on this module is to offer an easy connection to MySQL
View This module contains all class which are in charge of drawing thing on graphics
Model This module is here to do all the calculation of the game (enemy movement ...)
Controller The controller's module is here to manage everything (start the model(s),load maps from mysql...)
PlayerController This module contains the KeyBoardController class which listen users inputs and send order to players
Main This module just contains the main
Ressource This module is in charge of loading all Images and texts
Ticker The Ticker module bring a way to easily execute code periodically
